scripts.start: parcel edition.html mss.html synopse.html team.html translation.html index.html
scripts.build: parcel build --public-url /resources edition.html mss.html synopse.html team.html translation.html index.html --no-source-maps
scripts.website:
rm -r ./dist/* 
 rm -r ../docs/resources/* 
 npm run-script build
 cp ./dist/*.css ../docs/resources/
 cp ./dist/*.js ../docs/resources/
 cp ./dist/*.html ../docs/
